```{=html}
<!-- 1. Contenedor del Canvas con Posicionamiento Corregido -->
<canvas id="statsNetworkCanvas" style="position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: -1; pointer-events: none;"></canvas>

<script>
(function() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('statsNetworkCanvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    let particles = [];
    const particleCount = 55; // Densidad equilibrada
    const maxDistance = 190;  
    let width, height;

    function resize() {
        width = canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
        height = canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
        init(); 
    }

    class Particle {
        constructor() {
            this.x = Math.random() * width;
            this.y = Math.random() * height;
            // Velocidad fluida (Mantenida según tu preferencia)
            this.vx = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.9;
            this.vy = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.9;
            this.radius = Math.random() * 3 + 2; 
            
            // Paleta de colores vibrante solicitada
            const palette = [
                '212, 160, 23',  // Dorado Principal
                '26, 42, 58',    // Azul Marino
                '243, 223, 162', // Oro Claro Brillante
                '55, 118, 171'   // Azul Acero
            ];
            
            this.color = palette[Math.floor(Math.random() * palette.length)];
            this.alpha = Math.random() * 0.3 + 0.6; 
        }

        update() {
            this.x += this.vx;
            this.y += this.vy;

            if (this.x < 0 || this.x > width) this.vx *= -1;
            if (this.y < 0 || this.y > height) this.vy *= -1;
        }

        draw() {
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(this.x, this.y, this.radius, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            
            // Efecto de resplandor mantenido
            ctx.shadowBlur = 10;
            ctx.shadowColor = `rgba(${this.color}, 0.5)`;
            
            ctx.fillStyle = `rgba(${this.color}, ${this.alpha})`;
            ctx.fill();
            
            // Reset de sombra para las líneas
            ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
        }
    }

    function init() {
        particles = [];
        for (let i = 0; i < particleCount; i++) {
            particles.push(new Particle());
        }
    }

    function animate() {
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, width, height);
        
        for (let i = 0; i < particles.length; i++) {
            const p1 = particles[i];
            p1.update();
            p1.draw();

            for (let j = i + 1; j < particles.length; j++) {
                const p2 = particles[j];
                const dx = p1.x - p2.x;
                const dy = p1.y - p2.y;
                const dist = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);

                if (dist < maxDistance) {
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    // Líneas doradas visibles
                    ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(212, 160, 23, ${0.5 * (1 - dist / maxDistance)})`;
                    ctx.lineWidth = 1.4; 
                    ctx.moveTo(p1.x, p1.y);
                    ctx.lineTo(p2.x, p2.y);
                    ctx.stroke();
                }
            }
        }
        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
        resize();
        init();
    });

    resize();
    init();
    animate();
})();
</script>
```
